desc: 30 percent black pepper piperine infused into organic rice Increases bioavailability of curcumin by 2000 percent. Clean and healthy, easy to digest source of piperine. Organic rice infused with piperine creates resistant starch that helps digestion. Turmeric boost with bioavailable piperine

layout.text: Black pepper is the world's most popular spice and plays a significant role in traditional medicine. The essence of black pepper is piperine, the powerful antioxidant that gives pepper it's pungency. NutriPepper unlocks the piperine that's deep inside the peppercorn shell. Consistent amount of bioavailable piperine and pure black pepper flavor - just shake it on.
